head.title: {title} | It’s Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime
head.description: Chili’s is introducing its first video game, Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime. An authentic modernization of the cult-classic arcade game, art imitates life as players are challenged with saving humanity from the overpriced fast-food burgers of the evil Fast-Food Syndicate. The task? Build as many Big Smasher burgers as possible to climb the leaderboard and compete to win a lifetime of Chili’s burgers!.
head.descriptionSocial: Build Chili’s Big Smashers. Defeat the evil Fast-Food Syndicate. Compete for a chance to win a lifetime of Chili’s burgers!

slides.title: BECOME THE CHILI’S BIG SMASHER BURGERTIME CHAMPION
slides.text: Help save the Chili's Big Smasher and you could win a lifetime* of Chili's burgers! As in real burgers, not video game burgers. Climb atop the leaderboard by building as many Chili's Big Smashers before the evil Fast-Food syndicate smashes them forever.

slides.title: 1<sup>st</sup> PLACE
slides.text: Have what it takes to make Big Smashers and defeat the evil Fast-Food Syndicate? Climb the leaderboard to the top spot to win a Lifetime of Burgers* and an arcade cabinet of the Chili's Big Smasher BurgerTime game.

slides.title: 2<sup>nd</sup> + 3<sup>rd</sup> PLACE
slides.text: Defeat the evil Fast-Food Syndicate and be handsomely rewarded! Second and third place players on the leaderboard will each win an arcade cabinet of Chili's Big Smasher BurgerTime*!

slides.title: ADDITIONAL PRIZES
slides.text: Build burgers and be one of the first 250 players to collect the complete Chili's 3 For Me items (chips & salsa, fries, and drink) and you will win a Chili's gift card to enjoy a 3 For Me IRL!

head.title: How to Play
head.description: Some how to play page description

slides.title: BASIC MOVEMENT
slides.text: Press left and right to move, press up and down to climb ladders.
slides.textMobile: Use the joystick to move and climb ladders. Press the button to throw pepper.

slides.title: SCORING
slides.text: Walk over burger parts to drop them and score. Drop all the parts down to the basket to make a Big Smasher and start a score multiplier!

slides.title: ENEMIES
slides.text: Avoid trainees, and watch out for the bosses! Each level you’ll have 4 salt shakers you can use to stun them.

slides.title: EXTRA BONUSES
slides.text:
Get an extra life every 100,000 points and get a score bonus for collecting the 3 parts of the "3 for me" hidden on each level.
Good luck and have fun!

paragraphs: 1. Contest Period: The Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime Competition (the “Competition”) begins at 9:00 AM Eastern Time (“ET”) on June 25, 2024 and ends at 11:59 p.m. ET on July 14, 2024 (the “Competition Period”). The entire duration of the Competition runs from July 14, 2024 until potential winners have been notified, verified and prizes have been awarded (“Entire Competition Period”).

2. Eligibility: Open to legal residents of the 50 United States and the District of Columbia, who are 18 years of age or older as of date of game play. Officers, directors, and employees of Brinker International Payroll Company, L.P. (“Sponsor”), Don Jagoda Associates, Inc. Void where prohibited by law and subject to all federal, state and local laws.

3. How to Play and Winner Determination: During the Competition Period, visit chilisburgertime.com (the “Website”) and login or signup for My Chili’s Rewards, then play the BurgerTime game (“Game Play”). The objective of the game is to attempt to achieve a high score in the game. The top three (3) highest scoring players will win one of the three (3) prizes (subject to verification) in the order described in Section 6 below. If there is a tie from among the top score getters, the Competition Prize winner will be deemed the participant who arrives at that highest score first. Additionally, the first two hundred and fifty (250) players to acquire all three (3) “3 For Me” bonuses in the game (fries, chips/salsa and a drink) will also win a Bonus prize (“Bonus Prize”), subject to verification. Winner determination will be made by Administrator and decisions are final on all matters relating to the winner determination. Participants can play the game as often as they wish. Game Plays must be complete by 11:59 p.m. ET on July 14, 2024.

</br>All Game Plays must be complete to be eligible to win. All Game Plays become the property of Sponsor and will not be returned or acknowledged, and Sponsor will not verify receipt of Game Plays. All participants agree that, subject to applicable law, Sponsor and Sponsor's agents, affiliates or service providers may use participants' personal information submitted with Game Plays and/or play pursuant to the Sponsor’s privacy policy (See Section 11) and for purposes of prize fulfillment. Use of any automated or computer system to participate is prohibited and will result in disqualification. Proof of submission will not be deemed to be proof of receipt by Sponsor. In the event of a dispute as to the identity of participant, the authorized account holder of the email address used for Game Play will be deemed to be the participant. The "authorized account holder" is the natural person assigned an email address by an Internet access provider, online service provider, Internet service provider, or other organization (which may include an employer) responsible for assigning email addresses for the domain associated with the submitted address. Potential winners may be required to show proof of being the authorized account holder. Game Plays/My Chili’s Rewards account specifying an invalid, non-working, or inactive email address will be disqualified and ineligible to win.

4. Winner Notification & Verification: Competition and Bonus Prize winners will be notified on or about three (3) days after the end of the Competition Period. All Competition and Bonus Prize winners are subject to verification of eligibility. Game Plays are subject to verification at the sole discretion of Sponsor. In no event will Sponsor be obligated to award more than the stated number of prizes. Potential Competition Prize winners will be sent via email link a Declaration of Eligibility, Liability & Publicity Release (where legal) (collectively, “Declaration”) and will be required to complete, and sign the Declaration via email within three (3) business days of being notified in order to claim his/her prize. All Bonus Prizes will be awarded to eligible winners complying with these Official Rules within four (4) to six (6) weeks after verification is complete. Return of any prize or prize notification as undeliverable, or declining a prize for any reason, will result in disqualification and forfeiture of prize. If any potential Competition Prize winner fails to return the required Declaration within the required time period, or any prize notification is returned undeliverable, or in the event that any potential Competition Prize winner is disqualified for any reason, Sponsor will award the Competition prize to an alternate winner with the next highest score. Competition Prizes will be awarded provided a sufficient number of eligible Game Plays are received to award three (3) prizes. Unclaimed Bonus Prizes will not be awarded.

All potential winners are subject to verification by Sponsor and/or Administrator, whose decisions are final and binding in all matters related to the Competition. A participant is not a winner of any prize unless and until participant's eligibility has been verified and participant has been notified that verification is complete.
5. Prizes and Approximate/Retail Values (“ARV”):

One (1) First Place Competition Prize: A forty (40)-year supply of burgers, awarded as $31,200 in Chili’s Gift Cards and a $10,296 check to be used toward the payment of income taxes associated with the prize, plus a Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime arcade cabinet. Total ARV of the First Place Prize is $42,096.
One (1) Second Place Competition Prize: A Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime game cabinet (ARV $600).
One (1) Third Place Competition Prize: A Chili’s Big Smasher Burger Time game cabinet (ARV $600).
Two Hundred Fifty (250) Bonus Prizes: A free “3 For Me” meal, awarded in the form of a Chili’s e-gift card (ARV $15 each).
</br>Limit one (1) Bonus Prize and one (1) Competition Prize per person/email address.

</br>Prize Restrictions: Gift card/e-gift terms and conditions apply. Prizes cannot be substituted, assigned, transferred, or redeemed for cash; however, Sponsor reserves the right to make equivalent prize substitutions at its sole discretion if any advertised prize (or portion of a prize) becomes unavailable. The winner will receive a 1099 form in the mail for the actual retail value of the prize, to be processed in the year in which they receive the prize. </br>The ARV of any prize listed is subject to price fluctuations in the consumer marketplace based on, among other things, any gap in time between the date the ARV is estimated for purposes of these Official Rules, and the date the prize is awarded or redeemed. If the actual purchase price of a prize is less than the ARV stated herein, the prize winner will NOT be entitled to a check, cash or other form of payment for the price difference.

questions.title: Why is Chili’s introducing a Big Smasher BurgerTime video game?
paragraphs: Chili’s is continuing to highlight its value and quality as consumers are growing frustrated with increasing fast food prices.
Chili’s is committed to reaching new communities and Chili’s fans in unexpected, but authentic, ways by creating compelling experiences that these communities will seek to be a part of.

questions.title: Which fast food restaurants are the villains modeled after?
paragraphs: The Big Smasher BurgerTime villains resemble fictitious long lost fast-food mascots of decades past.

questions.title: Is there a deal/discount/promotion offered in restaurant during the competition?
paragraphs: Players are welcome to try Chili’s Big Smasher by ordering a 3 For Me that comes with fries, a bottomless non-alcoholic beverage and bottomless chips and salsa all for $10.99. The $6 June Marg of the Month, the Wish You Were Here Marg, featuring Lunazul Blanco Tequila, strawberry puree, Monin Watermelon Syrup, Monin Coconut Syrup and fresh sour, will also be available.

questions.title: What is the basis of the game?
paragraphs: Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime is based off the original BurgerTime video game where players advanced through various levels, collecting points as they build burgers ingredient by ingredient to achieve the highest score possible while fending off villains in each level.

questions.title: How similar is Chili’s BurgerTime to the original game?
paragraphs: While Chili’s is maintaining the integrity of the original BurgerTime game through the look and mechanics, they are making tweaks to modernize and Chilify the game in partnership with game designers from Media.Monks to increase the intelligence of the enemies and speed up the game play.

questions.title: How can I play the new Big Smasher BurgerTime game? Is it mobile friendly?
paragraphs: BurgerTime is free to play online at chilisburgertime.com on desktop or mobile. An original arcade cabinet console of the Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime game will be available for play at the Chili’s 45th and Lamar location in Austin, TX.

questions.title: Will there be arcade cabinets at every Chili’s?
paragraphs: There will be one arcade cabinet console available for guests to play at the Chili’s located at 45th and Lamar in Austin, TX.

questions.title: Why does my score say 0 if I have completed a level(s) and earned points?
paragraphs: Scores are only submitted to the leaderboard once all lives are lost. The maximum amount of levels you can play is 18 (the 6 levels, 3 times, that get increasingly more difficult). If you manage to complete all 18 levels in a row and still have lives left, your score will be submitted upon winning.

questions.title: How many times can I play?
paragraphs: Players will have unlimited play during the competition period of June 25 – July 14 with their registered account. They can continue to play the game after the competition ends.

questions.title: How long will the game be available?
paragraphs: The competition will run from June 25 to July 14, but Big Smasher BurgerTime will be available through June 2025.

questions.title: Can I use my game controller to play?
paragraphs: Yes, you can map your  Sony’s PS5 Dual Sense Wireless Controller or Microsoft’s XBOX Wireless Controller and play the game.

questions.title: What are the competition details? How do I win?
paragraphs: If you are located in the US, visit chilisburgertime.com to login or sign up with your My Chili’s Rewards account and play to get your highest score on the leaderboard. The player with the top score at the end of the competition will receive a lifetime supply of burgers and an arcade cabinet version of the game. Second and Third place winners will each receive an arcade cabinet of the game. If you are in the top three after July 14th, we will contact you about your prize. Player’s scores in restaurant at the 45th and Lamar location in Austin, TX will not count toward the competition.

questions.title: How long is the competition open?
paragraphs: The competition is open from 9:00 AM ET on 6/25/24; ends 11:59:59 PM ET on 7/14/24.

questions.title: How do I register for the competition?
paragraphs: Players can register at chilisburgertime.com to begin playing on June 25. Users will be required to login or signup for a My Chili’s Rewards account to save progress, see leaderboard scores and be eligible for prizes.

questions.title: I live outside of the US, can I still participate?
paragraphs: You can still play the game, but for the competition and prizing purposes anyone outside of the US is not eligible. Once the competition is complete, we will open registration for the leaderboard globally.

questions.title: With the first place prize of burgers for life, can you get a free burger every day?
paragraphs: The first place prize will be awarded in Chili’s gift cards and will be the equivalent of Chili’s burgers for 40-years equivalent to a $15 Chili’s gift card per week.

questions.title: Are there other prizes beyond the grand prize, second and third place?
paragraphs: The first 250 users who gather the 3 For Me bonus within the BurgerTime game will receive a Chili’s gift card to enjoy a 3 For Me meal on Chili’s.

questions.title: How will the game be scored, and the winner determined?
paragraphs: Chili’s version of BurgerTime will keep the original scoring mechanics of the game with additional chances for higher score potential like a bonus for completing each Big Smasher and collecting 3 For Me items along the way. The winner will be determined by the highest score on July 14.

Just like in the original, players who complete the six levels will be sent back to Level One, where it will increase in difficulty. The game continues in that loop, and each player has three lives per round to establish their score.

questions.title: What happens if there’s a tie score on the leaderboard in determining the winners?
paragraphs: The winner will be awarded based on time. The less time it took to get the higher score, wins.

questions.title: How will you compare arcade cabinet and online player winners?
paragraphs: The leaderboard will be for online competition players. The arcade versions of the game in-restaurant are for guests to enjoy, but scores will not be eligible for prizes.
